cells.data: -- show :: a -> Stringon show(e)	set c to class of e	if c = list then		showList(e)	else if c = record then		set mb to lookupDict("type", e)		if Nothing of mb then			showDict(e)		else			script				on |λ|(t)					if "Either" = t then						set f to my showLR					else if "Maybe" = t then						set f to my showMaybe					else if "Ordering" = t then						set f to my showOrdering					else if "Ratio" = t then						set f to my showRatio					else if "Tuple" = t then						set f to my showTuple					else if "Tuple3" = t then						set f to my showTuple3					else if "Tuple4" = t then						set f to my showTuple4					else						set f to my showDict					end if					tell mReturn(f) to |λ|(e)				end |λ|			end script			tell result to |λ|(Just of mb)		end if	else if c = date then		"\"" & showDate(e) & "\""	else if c = text then		"'" & e & "'"	else if (c = integer or c = real) then		e as text	else if c = class then		"null"	else		try			e as text		on error			("«" & c as text) & "»"		end try	end ifend show
